entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.9°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
